feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure primary contact is preferences in reports
  • Quickbooks imports
  • Update INR symbol
  • v5.11.39 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10659

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.38...v5.11.39

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.40
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for invoicing projects. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10664

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.39...v5.11.40

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.41
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change PDF Mock dates to ones that are parseable by twig
  • Test einvoice properties at the invoice level
  • API implementation of InvoicePeriod for Invoices and Recurring Invoices
  • Added e_invoice column to recurring invoices (Invoice Period Support)
  • Implement options for the display of HTML invoices in the client portal
  • Fixes for encoded URLs in twig templates
  • QB Backup imports
  • Handle chunked file uploads by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10674
  • v5.11.41 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10686

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.40...v5.11.41

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.42
entry.content: Client Locations New permission - disable emails for a user OpenAPI docs for locations Set Invoice Number as PO Number for PEPPOL invoices Translation updates Implement Attachments for PEPPOL Updated React Design Interface!! Updates for TS2 Color statement Upgrades for Company Backup/Restore
